Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Adams/Wabash
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Adams/Wabash due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Adams/Wabash due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
